Zscaler Private Access Ansible Collection

Version: 2.9.0

The Zscaler Private Access Ansible collection is a collection of modules that automate configuration and operational tasks on Zscaler Private Access Cloud. The underlying protocol uses API calls that are wrapped within the Ansible framework.

This is a community supported project; hence, this project or the software module is not affiliated or supported by Zscaler engineering teams in any way.

Installation

Ansible 2.9 is required for using collections.

Install the collection using ansible-galaxy:

ansible-galaxy collection install willguibr.zpacloud

Then in your playbooks you can specify that you want to use the zpacloud collection like so:

collections:
    - willguibr.zpacloud

  • Ansible Galaxy: https://galaxy.ansible.com/willguibr/zpacloud

  • GitHub repo: https://github.com/willguibr/zpa-ansible

  • Module Reference
    • zpa_app_connector_groups - Create/Update/Delete an App Connector Group.
    • zpa_app_connector_groups_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a App Connector Group.
    • zpa_application_segment - Create/Update/Delete an Application Segment.
    • zpa_application_segment_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of an Application Segment.
    • zpa_application_server - Create/Update/Delete an Application Server.
    • zpa_application_server_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of an Application Server.
    • zpa_ba_certificate_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a browser certificate resource.
    • zpa_browser_access - Create/Update/Delete a Browser Access Application Segment.
    • zpa_browser_access_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a browser access application segment.
    • zpa_cloud_connector_group_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a cloud connector group resource.
    • zpa_customer_version_profile_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a customer version profile.
    • zpa_enrollement_certificate_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of an enrollment certificate resource.
    • zpa_idp_controller_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of an idp controller resource.
    • zpa_machine_group_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a machine group resource.
    • zpa_policy_access_forwarding_rule module
    • zpa_policy_access_rule - Create/Update/Delete a Policy Access Rule.
    • zpa_policy_access_rule - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a Policy Access Rule.
    • zpa_policy_timeout_rule - Create/Update/Delete a Policy Access Timeout rule.
    • zpa_posture_profile_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a posture profile resource.
    • zpa_provisioning_key - Create/Update/Delete a Provisioning Key by association type
    • zpa_provisioning_key_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a Provisioning Key by association type
    • zpa_saml_attribute_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of SAML Attribute.
    • zpa_scim_attribute_header_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of SCIM Attribute Header.
    • zpa_scim_group_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of SCIM Group.
    • zpa_segment_group - Create/Update/Delete an Segment Group.
    • zpa_segment_group_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a segment group resource.
    • zpa_server_group - Create/Update/Delete an Server Group.
    • zpa_server_group_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a server group resource.
    • zpa_service_edge_groups - Create/Update/Delete an Service Edge Group.
    • zpa_service_edge_groups_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a Service Edge Group.
    • zpa_trusted_network_info - Get details (ID and/or Name) of a machine group resource.
